description: Developed, tested, and integrated early prototype readout electronics for a spaceborne LiDAR cubesat at Vidi Astra, showcasing proficiency in complex systems engineering tasks.
Performed ticket-based full stack development on the SaaS cloud platform for feature development and bug fixing.
